data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 12 & iPad Air 2 - iOS 12.1 Public Beta 1
data.actual_result: The timer no longer counts down when the app is backgrounded.
data.expected_result: Timer should continue counting down when the app is in the background.
data.short_description: Slowmode timer stops counting down while the app is in the background
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel with slowmode being enabled (set it to a bigger time interval to notice the bug) - Make sure you don't have manage channels or manage messages permission - Send a message - Observe the timer that appears now - Close the app (force closing not needed) - Go back to the app after some seconds - Check the timer again
